reviews.text: On a working farm and close to nature, breakfast to please even the most discerning. Not five star luxury, but clean and friendly and very convenient for Plymouth area, Dartmoor, Cornwall, Beaches, Wembury surfing and local walks. Country roads need care, but this is not the city. My second year staying for nearly 3 weeks and pleased again.
reviews.title: A Farm Stay in the country

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Gabber farm, difficult to find with the latter part of the journey being on single track lanes. The room was well furnished, clean with modern ensuite facilities. But the downside was unfriendliness of the host, and the unflexibility of the time of breakfast. This can be used as a good base to visit Plymouth and the surrounding areas, and Wembury beach is a nice little hideaway. Ideally you would use this B&B just as an overnight stop not as a week long holiday as we did. Parking at times was difficult.
reviews.title: If you only want a basic B&B then this is for you.
